body.name: Dr. Brown's Microwave Steam Sterilizer for Baby Bottles, Nipples, Bottle Parts, Pacifiers, Teethers and Breast Pump Parts

features: MICROWAVE STEAM. For baby bottles, bottle parts and more. Features a removable custom tray for easy cleaning.
HOLDS MULTIPLE BABY BOTTLES. Custom-molded, fiting up to four Dr. Brown’s bottles at once, plus bottle parts.
CLEAN BOTTLES AND PARTS IN MINUTES. Steam your baby bottles and parts in minutes with the fast-steaming Microwave Steam.
GREAT FOR BABY ACCESSORIES. Works on pacifiers, teethers, training cups and much more!
INCLUDED TONGS. Use tongs to easily remove bottles and bottle components after use keeping your parts clean and your hands safe.
body.description: Product Description Quickly sterilize baby bottles and parts in minutes with Dr. Brown’s Microwave Steam Sterilizer! The custom-molded bottle sterilizer can sterilize up to four Dr. Brown’s baby bottles at once, plus bottle parts and accessories. Easily remove bottles and bottle components after sterilization with included tongs to keep parts clean and your hands safe. The custom tray is removable for easy cleaning. The Microwave Steam Sterilizer is also perfect for sterilizing pacifiers, training cups, accessories and more! Bottles and parts not included. From the Manufacturer Dr. Brown's Sterilizer is uniquely suited to fit Dr. Brown's Bottles. It sterilizes up to 4 bottles. It holds standard or wide neck bottles. The sterilizer is dishwasher safe, uses tap water and includes plastic tongs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely convenient and works well
reviews.reviewText: This has become our go to sanitize bottles. Your put a little bit of water, throw it in the microwave and you're good. We had one of those electric sanitizers and never used it because we had this. It holds a decent amount of bottles, caps etc and is perfect when traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best products on the market! Easy to use. Easy to clean. Quick and easy for new moms and dad‘s to be able to sterilize what they need.😁😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: This has been a life saver and time saver. I use to boil everything on the stove. After getting tired of that I used the microwave bags. But with cost in mind I seeked out something reusable. This lead me to this product. I love this product. You simply add the water, arrange the bottles and items, microwave for five minutes or less, let stand for 10 minutes and finished. Also this item is easy to clean, either by hand the parts come apart easy or by dishwasher. I also have seen the reviews of where the unit melted, I have not had that issue. My unit after microwaving doesn’t run out of water or get dry enough to ever melt. It’s common sense I think on that it needs the certain amount of water and certain items cannot be done it, such as metal bottle brush cleaners that were shown on another review for melting the unit. Lol an item that should never have gone in the microwave to begin with. Also if you need to use this unit back to back, I just run cool water in the unit until it cools back down before using it the second time. I do this just to make sure it doesn’t get to hot and melt. Also this unit holds pretty good amount of items. But only holds 4 bottles. But with as quick as it sterilizes I have no problem using it twice a day. Would purchase again and again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Simple to use! Just pop it in my microwave for 5min (1100 Watt) and then put the bottles in a sterile place while they steam dry themselves. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a way to sterilize my bottles and pump parts but didn’t want to constantly be boiling water and I didn’t have counter space for a sterilizing machine. So this was a great fit. It’s easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use it every day
reviews.reviewText: Faster and easier than boiling, and fits a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Quickly Sanitizing
reviews.reviewText: I originally had purchased an electric sterilizer that could sterilize up to 11 bottles. I love it but it was becoming a hassle to wait 40+ minutes when all I really needed was my pumping accessories. At first I got the Dr Brown microwavable bags, but when I did the math, I realized it made more sense to just invest in this one; and I am so glad I did! I no longer use the electric one - it's so easy to wait 4 minutes and then a couple minutes for cool-down.*I saw a few reviews comment that it can be difficult to put all the bottles...I don't think so! Certainly no more difficult than the electric sterilizer! You do have to be precise in where you put stuff, but Doc already thought of that and created this with different holes to hold different things. It took me a couple tries to figure out the best system for me, but I can easily sterilize my pumping stuff and two 8 oz bottles with their accessories. I will try to remember to take a picture next time I do it - I keep meaning to but am always in such a rush!

I absolutely love this product because it's super easy to use. Add water, fill it up with cleaned baby bottles and pump stuff and than just put it into the microwave for 2 minutes, and then just like that you have sanitized your baby stuff. :)
Producto especialemente cómodo y funcional. Lo recomiendo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Sterilisesthe bottles fine but doesn’t hold as many as it claims so you end up having to do more than one run to get all your bottles done properly
Habe nicht viel zu sagen. Erfüllt sein Zweck, leicht zu bedienen und reinigen, man kann selbstverständlich Produkte von anderen Herstellern auch mit ihm sterilisieren. Absolute Empfehlung.
